pageContext.claim: “So interesting that bad lawyer Michael Cohen, who sadly will not be testifying before Congress, is using the lawyer of Crooked Hillary Clinton to represent him - Gee, how did that happen? Remember July 4th weekend when Crooked went before FBI & wasn't sworn in, no tape, nothing?”
pageContext.analysis: Trump often complains that Clinton was not "sworn in" when she was interrogated by the FBI. However, as the Russia investigation has repeatedly shown, lying to an FBI agent is a punishable crime not all that different from lying under oath.
